item.description:
Did I mention it's free? We'll meet for an optional picnic supper starting at 6:00; concert starts at 7:00. Sylvia will meet people by the concession stand at the back of the oval (the large, ovoid grassy space in front of the Hatch Shell stage). If you'll be coming after 6:00, call Sylvia's cell at 857-756-7981 and I'll stand up and wave so you can find us. Program includes "Jupiter" from Holst's The Planets, Beethoven's Symphony no. 7, and more.

No alcohol allowed. Low chairs OK. Bug repellent advisable.

MBTA: Red Line: get off at the MGH/Charles Street station, go down the stairs and follow the river to the Hatch Shell.

Green Line: Get off at the Arlington Street station and follow Arlington St. to the Arthur Fiedler Footbridge. Go over the footbridge and you will arrive near the meeting spot.
item.name: Free Orchestra Concert at the Hatch Shell
